boardgame.name: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Castle Ravenloft Board Game
boardgame.description: Castle Ravenloft Boardgame by Bill Slavicsek, Mike Mearls and Peter Lee_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The master of Ravenloft is having guests for dinner _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and you are invited!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Evil lurks in the towers and dungeons of Castle Ravenloft, and only heroes of exceptional bravery can survive the horrors within. Designed for 1-5 players, this boardgame features multiple scenarios, challenging quests, and cooperative gameplay._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player selects a hero; a ranger, rogue, warrior, cleric, or wizard. On their turn, each player can explore further into the dungeon (turn over new tiles), move through the already explored parts of the dungeon, and fight monsters. When a new dungeon tile is revealed, there is typically an encounter of some sort, and new monsters to fight are added. Slain monsters reward the players with treasure, and experience points, allowing them to level up and increase their skills during play. Players must cooperate to stay alive, slay the monsters, and achieve the goal of their quest. Each scenario has a different goal - from retrieving a relic, to slaying a vampire lord._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 207790000) The master of Ravenloft is having guests for dinner - and you are invited! Evil lurks in the towers and dungeons of Castle Ravenloft, and only heroes of exceptional bravery can survive the horrors within. Designed for 1-5 players, this boardgame features multiple scenarios, challenging quests, and cooperative game play.

*** 4th Dimension Games *** Castle Ravenloft the Board Game: $44.95 In Stock (7% sales tax for residents of Pennsylvania) This is a New, Sealed in Box Castle Ravenloft the Board Game board game. Publisher: Wizards of the Coast [WOC20779] Number of Players: 1-5 Ages: 12+ Length: 60 minutes Shipping: Shipping rates will be determined upon sale or request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. The shipping costs are NOT inflated. You pay exactly what I am charged for shipping, along with material costs. I ship through FedEx or USPS, whichever is cheaper. Normal shipping costs run from $8.00 - $11.00. If you have a commercial address that I can send to, your shipping costs will be even less! Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders, personal and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. I will add 3.9% to the price when paying by PayPal. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.

Please note that the ONLY reason I am calling this game Very Good instead of Like New is due to some damage to the box lid when the game was shipped to me. The damage is not serious (I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even realize it was there until after I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d had the game awhile), and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included a picture of the upper left corner of the lid where it is. Everything else in the game is in absolutely, barely played with Like New condition. Some of the figures are still in their protective plastic and have not yet been opened/removed. All components are present and like I said, everything would easily fall into the Like New category, if not for the shipping damage (see 2nd picture). I will probably ship with UPS, but I could probably use another carrier if you so desire. If you have questions regarding shipping costs, international shipping, or any other info, please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to message me. *Edit* I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m having trouble getting the BGG marketplace to show the pictures.
